text.text: Doug Robinson is a highly respected geologist with an exceptional record of precious metal discoveries over the past 50 years, will continue to be involved as a consultant and will assist in the next steps in continuing gold exploration at the acquired property. The property was purchased in two parts:
200 hectares from geologist Doug Robinson with a strike length of over 2 km
and then right beside 610 hectares known as the “Tinney” property from a group of highly renowned prospectors.
